title: B: A non-faded, SGC 3+ n172 Old Judge common
author: Stetson_1883

posts.post_title: B: A non-faded, SGC 3+ n172 Old Judge common
posts.post_content:
Would like to pick up a non-faded Old Judge common, with decent corners and pref. no creases. Something only graded by SGC with a 3 or better. They seem to be sorta hard to come by (esp. the non-faded part), but I'm picky!

Going on vacation for 10 days and will check back then. Thx.
